'''Heir to the Ancient Sea's Authority''' is [[Neuvillette]]'s [[1st Ascension Passive]].

==Gameplay Notes==
* When Neuvillette possesses all 3 stacks, parts of his outfit and hair will glow.
* Each type of Hydro-related reaction only grants 1 stack no matter how many times it is triggered. More than one type of reaction must be triggered to gain more stacks.

===Constellation Effects===
* {{Talent Note|constellation|1|Venerable Institution}}
